title: Crystal, Minn. priest pushes COVID-19 conspiracies during homily, warns against vaccines
description: A local priest is facing scrutiny over a recent homily and his stance on the coronavirus pandemic. In a homily delivered this past Sunday, Father Robert Altier spent 20 minutes explaining why he believes the COVID-19 virus was manufactured and spread on purpose.
